website_summaries.verdict: Classic size 5 rugby ball that offers a good grip for practice or recreational play.
pros: Uses outer cover of rubber and cotton to provide a steady grip on the ball
Provides a good price point for a recreational level of rugby ball
Carries a standard size 5 that's perfect for practice sessions
cons: Ball struggles to continue holding air the more it's used

customer_reviews.title: i was looking for a kids sized ball which is ...
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a kids sized ball which is surprisingly difficult to find, have not experienced the other peoples [problem of deflation. had it a few months and still filledf with air
customer_reviews.author: A. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: This ball makes me happy. I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball. It is rubberish, feels grippy. I can't keep my hands off it. I sit on the couch and just toss it up over and over. This kind of ball is foreign to me being from the states, but I still like it. I go outside, and kick it. I kick a field goal with it. I play with it. I feel it. It makes me happy. : )
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: It's Great When It Holds Air
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap rugby ball. The biggest problem I have is that mine doesn't hold air for more than a few hours. When it's pumped up, it's great, but... even for the money, one should be able to have a ball that stays inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lemon

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and don't know the first thing about rugby but I think she liked it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tacky (good) and holds air
customer_reviews.text: Easy to catch. Nice tacky surface. If anything happens to it, we’ll come back and reorder the same exact one.
customer_reviews.author: MO folk

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We are very excited to try this out! It is a Christmas present, so we haven't had it on the field yet, but I am sure that it will be just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine for me, a beginner to the game
customer_reviews.text: You simply need to pump it up after two or three good uses. It has a great grip and is the right size. This was my first rugby ball ever purchased and of course it works fine for me, a person who is still learning and just enjoying the game.
customer_reviews.author: Bradencn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a little skinnier than a rugby ball should be similar to a football. It also needs to be pumped up after every use. Spend the extra bucks for a proper rugby ball.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Thomas

customer_reviews.title: DEFLATED in 8 months
customer_reviews.text: This ball was great until month 8 when it stopped holding air. Not abused, just found it deflated one day. Reached out to company and got zero response. Would have accepted no warranty if only they would have at least responded.
customer_reviews.author: JAC-ASC

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an Aussie football to play around with, nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Popped within a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball, thinking it would last months, maybe a year, it popped within a week of use, only two practices and it popped.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Yong-tok Pang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect practice ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a practice ball for my grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugby Ball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I bring it to practice and play with it all the time. I’ve had the same one for months and it is still fully inflated and in great condition. This one is official game regulation size.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Iacono

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pro sized ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball worked very well for my sister. She was able to use this and a kick stand to help practice her kicking. She said it helped her so much getting ready for the season
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't stay inflated for long
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay inflated for months on end but overall it's really good quality and I always use it at practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball about a month ago. It does everything that I need a Rugby Ball to do. It holds a tight spiral, it holds up under a good punt, It does everything that you need a ball to do. If you want a "Ball of higher quality".... pay the extra $40.00 for it. You are getting an amazing deal by purchasing this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Gallahad

customer_reviews.title: Leak badly
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these neither one would hold enough air pressure to even inflate them they are useless buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: A good rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: It's a good rugby ball, The grip has held up well even after a couple months of use. The air bladder and valve have yet to spring a leak I've only had to pump up the ball once.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: it's a pretty sucky ball
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's a pretty sucky ball. Mine inflates well, but is not shaped like a typical rugby ball. It is edgy and not smooth all around, giving too much grip (not in a good way). Probably should've just spent $60 on a Gilbert.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Best training ball
customer_reviews.text: My son and I play the heck out of this ball pretty much on a daily basis for the last couple of months. Even with that kind of punishment, it has kept its shape, and holds air like a brand new ball. Great ball at a great price from a fantastic seller. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rugger

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Big for my son who is 12, but nice to have to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This ball has to be durable, it has been used for football and rugby. #thethingskidsdowhwntheyrebored #covidgoaway
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the quality of the rugby balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Operation Interdependence to send to our deployed troops per request. I was happy with the quality of the rugby balls, they're well made and going to be great for our troops!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Seems great - not an expert since it is my first Rugby purchase. Son watched tournament on TV and wanted one. Very nice grip and so far has held air nicely although not much use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and shape, but 8-10psi only holds for a few days
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this ball over the comparably priced Gilbert practice balls my team typically uses. It just doesn't hold air at acceptable pressure for more than a few days, and the seal around the air hole isn't very good. Constant air loss when a needle is inserted--not at an extreme rate that prevents you from ever getting the ball inflated, but it's non-negligible.
customer_reviews.author: jhammin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Balls
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent balls. They will fulfill you in every way imaginable. These balls are easy to grab, and hang on to. They are easy to carry, they're solid, but not too heavy. They have the perfect texture. Overall, these balls are very pleasurable to play with. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Thie

customer_reviews.title: Go to Ball for the Last 5 Years
customer_reviews.text: Generally my go to ball. Only four stars because I have to pump it up weekly. I keep a pump around but compared to some of our higher end balls it's a noticeable flaw. The grip is impeccable and holds up to the rainy Seattle days.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect size for high school students
customer_reviews.text: Durable and perfect size for high school students. A little more weight to it than the rookierugby balls. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: x2workout

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfaction, ball has holes on both ends.
customer_reviews.text: Idk if im the only person with this problem, but this ball doesn't take any air.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Anthony

customer_reviews.title: great value tough ball
customer_reviews.text: Gilbert makes great balls but they cost twice as much, these are just as good, the deflation is a minor issue for me I always have a pump around. But this ball is tough and holds up to the beating Rugby brings. I will buy more of these, and the seller is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for our son who has recently started paying rugby and needed a practice ball. he's seems happy with it. It came on time and looks like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Santa's Elf

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since it was $10 cheaper than the Gilbert brand. We were very pleased with the quality of this standard-sized ball. Obviously it arrives deflated so be sure to have a pump on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie the Wonderdog

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ball has a good look. Very responsive customer service when I had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for my boys for Christmas. They are 15 and 13 and can be hard on things. I think they have used this ball just about every day since then and it has been great for them.
customer_reviews.author: jplaizier

customer_reviews.title: Great practice ball
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other negative reviews I haven't had any problems with the ball holding air even after several sessions and a few weeks. Great grip and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Overall great !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball for great price. My son is new to rugby and the grip on the ball is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball
customer_reviews.text: My kids just got into rugby so this was the perfect ball, it’s durable and of great quality. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was as promised and the quality is excellent. My grandson will have to play with it ...
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was as promised and the quality is excellent. My grandson will have to play with it a while to see haw it stands up to his play.
customer_reviews.author: dezman

customer_reviews.title: Ball is great...
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes the ball. He says it stays grippy better than other balls. But the graphics on it are just plain bad. Kind of ugly (especially the URL)
customer_reviews.author: W. Harold

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we received it my son pumped it up and went and practiced
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: It's not Gilbert material (obviously) but It's good as a very first rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: i haven't put this ball down since I got it several weeks back. It's not Gilbert material (obviously) but It's good as a very first rugby ball.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Dario Herrera

customer_reviews.title: At first sight i loved this rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: I am from Uruguay and I recently recived my order . At first sight i loved this rugby ball, but after one day of Having inflated the ball i think it is broken . It Loses Air within hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She enjoys practicing with this and says it's a great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Was for a friend and she absolutely loves it! She enjoys practicing with this and says it's a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Llamabeans

customer_reviews.title: In stock
customer_reviews.text: Had what I needed in stock and shipping was great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice ball
customer_reviews.text: Great training ball. Good tacky surface that doesn't get slick when wet. It gets a little flat after about a week of non use.
customer_reviews.author: Jared C

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you inflate the ball at least once a week or every 3-4 uses and you will be fine. Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!! Would have helped to have instructions on how to pump it with air. Took us a while to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However it smelled like mold when we received it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the ball, However it smelled like mold when we received it. and still now after playing with it we can still smell it. Very sturdy ball though!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and the product is perfect for my clubs practices!!!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I expected
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, this is a great ball. It was cheap, and with Prime, it arrived in no time at all. My only complaint is that its not a match ball, but thats to be expected. Its very grippy, and feels a lot like a basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed!! When putting the air before using the ball, the air is leaking out from the both side of top!! I decided to return it and not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Yuichi I.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Works great just the same as a Gilbert or kukri ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had some strings coming out of the ball,
customer_reviews.text: Had some strings coming out of the ball, it was a present so I didn't want to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I've just begun to learn and play the game of rugby. This ball has been well worth the money. It grips well which makes for easy grasping and throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I would recommend to any casual rugby players. Especially good as a practice ball same quality of the game ball.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: A great value, and the "gripiness" of the skin helps ...
customer_reviews.text: A great value, and the "gripiness" of the skin helps when teaching the proper way to pass a rugby ball - especially for youth players.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: Great rugby ball. I bought for my son that plays high school rugby. He has been using it regularly and it is durable. Shipping was very fast even right before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: TroT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything came a promised and the ball is a perfect fit for my lifestyle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bargain
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little smaller on the hands but good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KaniNY

customer_reviews.title: Ends were a bit too pointy
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself is made well, but the points are shaped a bit too much like a football's. However, it is overall a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect practice ball it has great grip it is a ball that will last a very long time and it has a low price I gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: bernard

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I love the grip it has, only problem was that when it gets dirty the grip looses feel
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ball.
customer_reviews.text: For half the price of a Gilbert ball, you can practice with this bad boy. This ball has more grip than the balls I have at rugby practice, and relatively easy to catch when wet. Don't worry about this ball losing air while you're using it. You should be pumping up your balls before using them, anyway. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, my son was very excited to have received it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Already have used it multiple times and done great on every game!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for a friend of mines kid. I've played rugby for 20 years and this is a great ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MARC KUNIS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We have already taken it out to throw around. Nice grip/feel. My son loves it! We hope to get a lot of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: R M 33

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a habit of loosing air after a couple days, have to stay on it
customer_reviews.author: Connor Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: piece of crap Went flat two days after we got it.Big waste of money
customer_reviews.author: kelly needle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed son.
customer_reviews.text: We got this ball for my son for his Birthday. We pumped it up. It was too cold and rainy tobplay so he put it in his closet. When he went back a few days later it was flat. What a disappointment! He never even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Although this ball looks crappy with all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Value! Although this ball looks crappy with all the stupid writing on it, it actually is a pretty decent ball. It is more evenly balanced than the Gilbert training balls, has slightly better grip, and costs less. If you are looking for a good practice ball for great price, it cant be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hugo

customer_reviews.title: good ball good price
customer_reviews.text: Good feel, holds air. What else is there to say? I've been happy with it, no problems with pileups on the ball making it pop or change shape or anything
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: It's a good ball
customer_reviews.text: Well I like to use Gilbert rugby balls but this is a good ball too. If you are looking for a ball that's good but not too expensive. This is the ball. It has good grip and I would say the only one bad thing is the air comes out faster than normal balls.
customer_reviews.author: Rlopez

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: It will not hold air. There is a leak at each end. It was promised for Christmas delivery, and it didn't make it. Then it was defective. Total waste! Glad Santa didn't get to give it to my son since it was worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Does not inflate fully, holes at either end means ball loses air with slightest amount of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Looses air.
customer_reviews.text: It would be perfect except for the fact that it looses air in a matter of hours. When squeezed, I can hear and feel the air coming out of the seems on the end.
customer_reviews.author: David Ebrahim

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: this is everything I was looking for in a rugby ball..high quality, good price, official playing size, quick shipping, and good company to deal with. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: miles sheahan

customer_reviews.title: does not last - leaks air
customer_reviews.text: Ball leaks air about 60 days after purchase but outside of return window. buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Dinh

product_meta.title: Pro Impact Training Rugby Ball - Professional Grade Ball - Ideal Toss & Kick Practice for Youth & Adult - Indoor or Outdoor Use - Size 3,4,5 Assorted Colors
feature_bullets: DURABLE SURFACE. The Pro Impact Rugby Ball is designed with an outer cover crafted using a combination of synthetic rubber, cotton and polyester materials to provide long-term durability and a steady grip on the ball.
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION. A heavy-duty latex bladder on the interior increases the bag’s integrity, preventing loss of air even after being repeatedly tossed and kicked around.

CHOICE OF SIZE. To accommodate beginners, intermediates and advanced users, the rugby ball is available in size 3, 4 and 5 options. Each one is built for durability and high performance throughout your practice sessions.
HIGH PERFORMANCE. Built to last using high-quality materials, this rugby ball is designed to maintain shape, air retention and consistent bounce to bring your training sessions to a whole new level.

VERSATILE USE. The Pro Impact Training Rugby Ball is specially designed to withstand extensive wear and tear when training day after day. As such it’s great for team sports in schools, universities, clubs and more.
